sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_847080_e_learnin_schedule_class</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>scheduling classes</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sysauto_script");
    gr.initialize();
    gr.setValue('name',current.name);
    gr.active = true;
    gr.conditional = true;
   // gr.condition = 'var answer = true;var today = new GlideDate(); var gr = new GlideRecord("x_847080_e_learnin_holidays_list");gr.addQuery("date", today); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { answer = false; }answer;';
    gr.run_type = 'weekly';
    gr.time_zone = 'floating';
    var gt = new GlideTime();
    gt.setValue('07:00:00');
    gr.entered_time = gt;
   // gr.script = 'var cd = new GlideDate();var today = new GlideDateTime();var gr = new GlideRecord("x_847080_e_learnin_meeting");gr.initialize(); gr.setValue("subject", current.subject);  gr.setValue("teacher", current.teacher); gr.setValue("class_date", cd);gr.setValue("when", today);  gr.setValue("start_time", current.start_time);  gr.setValue("end_time", current.end_time);   gr.setValue("assigned_to", current.assigned_to);  gr.setValue("class_duration", current.duration); gr.insert();';
	gr.initialize();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-08 03:48:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b8b9bc752fe4d110b39218aa2799b663</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>scheduling classes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="E-Learning system" source="x_847080_e_learnin">8c957c8f2f141110b39218aa2799b6cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="E-Learning system">8c957c8f2f141110b39218aa2799b6cf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b8b9bc752fe4d110b39218aa2799b663</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-08 09:38:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b8b9bc752fe4d110b39218aa2799b663"/></record_update>
